column4: Hey can anyone tell me how to find a new device on ubuntu? I just put in a new cdrom and I can't figure out how to get my system to recognize it.
and it isn't recognized as /dev/hdc or /dev/hdc1 or anything?
no, mount it to a mount point
are you talking to me or someone els?
ok how do I use pastebin?
seems it didn't find your drive at all
thats what I thought. is there any way I can search for it manually?
I do have all of that.
I hate, HATE asking this to people since I don't like to appear condescending, but did you install the device properly?
i'm quite sure I did although I don't know too much about computers.  On windows you just plug it all in and you can search for the device or it just recognizes there is a new one
How do I check the jumper setting?
you'd want to turn your system off
if I have a cdrom that is compatable with linux will it recognize it automatically or will I have to install it manually?
it should just recognize it on boot
